questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Ntudohoke namba
kugenzura ibishobisho vyawe
Gukorera mu runani rwiza

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kuvuga, kwibuka no kwerekana ibishobisho bitandukanye
Gufasha abanyeshure kwibuka amategeko agoye no kubafasha kwiyumvira imbere yogukora
Gufasha abanyeshure kwiga gukorera mu runani, naho hoba hariho ibibatandukanya

questions.question: Ni nde munyeshure yogira ico asabikanya mu gukoresha iryungane "umuyaga urahuhuse ku uwo ariwe wese â€¦"?
answers: Ategerezwa kuba umunyeshure abonekana kenshi ko avuga ibintu nk'incabwenge
Yotegerezwa kuba umunyeshure yabaye uwanyuma mu kwicara mu muzunguruko uheze
Yotegerezwa kuba umunyeshure uwo ariwe wese nshatse guhitamwo

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guha amahirwe abanyeshure bakunda ibintu vyemerwa kw'ishure no mu hira
Nohitamwo abanyeshure bo gusabikanya bari kw'isonga mw'isomero ryabo
Notegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure mu kuraba hirya no hino uwukunda ibinaka no gutahura ubudasa

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kwerekana ko ntemeranya n'ivyo abana bakunda n'ivyo badakunda
Notegezwa guhindura agakorwa mu guhitamwo ico tuganirako mu gihe abanyeshure bamaze guhabwa amahirwe yo kwimenyereza agakorwa mu gukoresha ibikundwa n'ibidakundwa
Notegerezwa kwemerera abanyeshure batatu gusa mu gusabikanya

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa gutera intege abanyeshure mu gutahura ubudasa
Sinotegerezwa kwemere abanyeshure gushima uwundi munyeshure bitewe n'ivyo bakunda n'ivyo badakunda
Sinotegerezwa gusobanura kwari vyiza kugira ivyo bahuriyeko n'ibibatandukanya.

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero k'ikibazo wotegerezwa kubaza abanyeshure bawe mu mwanya w'ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa?
answers: Kubera iki wibaza ko ari ngirakamaro kumenya ko hari ivyo uhuriyeko niyo utandukaniyeko na bagenzi bawe bo mw'ishure?
Kwoba ugukorana n'umugenzi kwari ubumenyi bwiza canke ubumenyi bubi?
Ni gute wibaza ko ibikorwa vyawe bikora ku nyifato za bagenzawe imisi yose?

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero k'ikintu abanyeshure boshobora kuvuga inyuma y'iryungane "Umuyaga urahuhuta k'uwo ariwe wese?)
answers: Kuzungagiza ibiganza vyabo
Ni umwana akuze mu muryango wabo
Gukora ku minwe yabo
